amendment.description: Amendment deletes language computing basic support payments and construction payments for impact aid programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to delete the provisions of the bill which eliminate basic support payments for schools districts based upon the adverse impact on those school district by the increased student population resulting from children of military personnel who live on nearby bases.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
